name: Vitale #19
description: Your 1.03 carat Light Pink diamond is rare, with only 1 in 650,000 diamonds having similar characteristics. The pink hue of your diamond is the product of a geological phenomenon that occurs when certain diamonds undergo more forcible pressure and heat than others. The distorted atomic structure resulting from this process bends light rays at an angle that absorbs green light, producing the pink tint. Resembling a delicate cherry blossom, this unique colour evokes feelings of affection and charm. A mere 2 to 5 similar diamonds enter the market yearly.
